1.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is visible and centered, but it appears to be more than 1 meter away. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.

2.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is clearly visible and centered in the image, but it still appears to be more than 1 meter away. Moving forward will bring the drone closer to the target.

3.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is clearly visible, extremely close, with fine surface texture and well-defined edges. There are no obstacles blocking the view.
